gameDetails.name: Space Master: Star Strike
gameDetails.description:
From the box:

Starcraft Combat in the Far Future

Iron Crown Enterprises presents Space Master: Star Strike, a fast-paced boardgame of starcraft combat in the far future. Simulate deep-space battles involving any number of vessels. Dogfight with small but lethal SMAC fighters or deploy Line Cuisers to slug it out with a death dealing Dreadnought.

Expanded by:

    Star Strike Vessel Compendium #1: Adventurer Class
    Star Strike Vessel Compendium #2: Pursuit Class
    Star Strike Vessel Compendium #3: Imperial Ships
